localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A community of once rejected YC founders to share experiences, discuss less tedious ways to get funding, and alternate options to grow their business. Join to connect and learn with a group of motivated founders!
blogPost.body: A community of once rejected YC founders to share experiences, discuss less tedious ways to get funding, and alternate options to grow their business. Join to connect and learn with a group of motivated founders!
blogPost.title: rally - A community of rejected YC founders
blogPost.author: Troy Osinoff

localize.description: 一个曾经拒绝YC创始人的社区，他们分享经验，讨论不那么单调乏味的融资方式，并选择其他方式来发展他们的业务。加入，与一群积极进取的创始人联系和学习！
一個曾經拒絕YC創始人的社區，他們分享經驗，討論不那麼單調乏味的融資方式，並選擇其他方式來發展他們的業務。加入，與一羣積極進取的創始人聯繫和學習！

previous.title:
Tenet is like the blockchain

No one really understands it well enough to explain it but pretending you understand it makes you look/feel intelligent

localize.full_text:
Tenet就像区块链

没有人真的能很好地解释它，但假装你理解它会让你看起来/感觉上很聪明。

Tenet就像區塊鏈

沒有人真的能很好地解釋它，但假裝你理解它會讓你看起來/感覺上很聰明。

next.excerpt: 5 Years of Design is collection of beautiful, handpicked designs I've saved as inspiration and shared on my newsletter the past five years. Select a year, spot trends and find inspiration 🌌.
next.title: 5 Years of Design - Time travel through handpicked, beautiful designs.

localize.description: “5年设计”是我在过去五年的时事通讯中保存并分享的精美精选设计的合集，这些设计都是我作为灵感而保存下来的。选择一年，发现趋势并找到灵感🌌。
localize.tagline: 通过亲手挑选的漂亮图案进行时间旅行。

localize.description: “5年設計”是我在過去五年的時事通訊中保存並分享的精美精選設計的合集，這些設計都是我作爲靈感而保存下來的。選擇一年，發現趨勢並找到靈感🌌。
localize.tagline: 通過親手挑選的漂亮圖案進行時間旅行。
